title: Celtic Frost - Best Of - 1984 to 2006
description:
This is a compilation of MY favorite Celtic Frost songs. All of their albums are represented here from 1984's Morbid Tales to 2006's Monotheist.  Yes, even songs from the dreaded (and hated) Cold Lake cd are here.

I picked the songs i like the best, ripped them to .wav files with Ashampoo and then burned my own 2-disc set. Then i decided to share it. So, i converted the .wav files to .flac with Foobar. I compiled them in the order of the year the albums were released. These are from the remasters except for Cold Lake which never was remastered.

I hope they sound good for you. The only altering was combining the intro leading into the song Into The Crypts Of Rays of Morbid Tales so as to avoid that gap we all hate to hear. I didn't alter anything else as i'm not that excelled in editing music files. Of course, people have different tastes and like different songs. These are my faves.

Disc 1:
01) Intro /Into The Crypts Of Rays
02) Visions Of Mortality
03) Dethroned Emperor
04) Return To The Eve
05) The Usurper
06) Jewel Throne
07) Mexican Radio
08) Mesmerized
09) Inner Sanctum
10) Babylon Fell (Jade Serpent)
11) Sorrows Of The Moon
12) (Once) They Were Eagles
13) Cherry Orchards
14) Blood On Kisses
15) Downtown Hanoi

Disc 2:
16) Roses Without Thorns
17) The Heart Beneath
18) The Name Of My Bride
19) The Restless Seas
20) Phallic Tantrum
21) Vanity
22) Nemesis
23) Idols Of Chagrin
24) A Descent To Babylon (Babylon Asleep)
25) The Inevitable Factor
26) Journey Into Fear
27) Under Apollyon's Sun
28) Progeny
29) Ground
30) Domain of Decay


Please seed. Put the download where you want the folder to go. There are no zip or rar files, so there's no excuse to not seed.
